ygData.msgSnippet: Lunarpine hears the low growl and nnows he s being followed, he enters a patch of high grass and rolls around on the ground for a bit, the concentrated smell

Lunarpine hears the low growl and nnows he's being followed, he 
enters a patch of high grass and rolls around on the ground for a 
bit, the concentrated smell should confuse his stalker. He circled 
around and let out a high pitched howl, it would attract attention 
but it would also let it know that he knew that it was there.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> The Tiger leaves the area of the pod and roams forth.  It can smell 
> the scent of a wolf and it looks about.  It lets out a low growl 
and 
> slowly walks on.  It follows the scent trail left by the wolf.  the 
> tiger knows it's getting closer to it's prey because the scent 
trail 
> is getting strong.  It uses stealth and cunning to follow it's next 
> meal.  It moves through the trees without a sound.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> > The wolf smells the air, something was coming his way, something 
> big and
> > organic. Lunarpine kept moving forward he was safe unless it was 
> hungry.
> >
